cons:
Without work overtime compensate. Worst promotion system, was decide how long you stay in the company but not consider your contribution. Limit employee ability of work due to company working flow. Very hard to balance the work and family because too much work & travel to China factory and too less pay.
Advice to Management
Don't try to cost reduction all the time. Stop to play SAFE!!! Manager was thinking as a old school style and just want to keep their position without taking any risk and it was major problem to prevent company grown up.
